titleStmt.title: A declaration of Major George Wither, prisoner in the Tower of London with his desires to Sir John Robinson, His Majesties lieutenant: writ on three fair trenchers, with a piece of char-coal. Worthy of the readers serious perusal.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: DFo copy, reel 2378, is cropped at head affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
